text:
Title: Self-Improving Pipelines
Objective: Evaluate multi-agent LLM workflows.
Methods: Orchestrated reader, summarizer, critic, integrator.
Results: Better grounded summaries; small latency overhead.
Limitations: Sensitive to context budget.
target_summary: Multi-agent pipeline (reader-summarizer-critic-integrator) improves groundedness with slight latency trade-off; results depend on available context.

text:
Title: Graph-Augmented Agents
Objective: Use graphs for planning.
Methods: LangGraph-based execution with timeouts per node.
Results: Deterministic control-flow; stable latencies.
Limitations: More boilerplate than sequential chains.
target_summary: LangGraph enables deterministic, timeout-guarded agent workflows; robust but with more setup than sequential orchestration.
